document_data.name: Spikenard
document_data.mainbody: '''Spikenard''' was a type of plant found in the Realms.
document_data.Usages:
* The recipe for the [[ink]] needed to write a [[scroll]] of the [[spell]] ''[[Write]]'' required boiling spikenard alongside [[mistletoe]] and [[owl eye]].{{Cite dragon/62/Pages from the Mages|19}}
* Certain [[conjuration]] spells could be aided by a tailored infusion of fenugreek.<ref group="note" name="level">More specifically, this effects 6{{th}} level conjuration spells.
